Question: In 2006, this person released the classical work Ecce Cor Meum.
Hints: In 1961, Sutcliffe left the band and this person reluctantly became their bass player.
This person is a supporter of the animal-rights organization People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals.
This person earned his latest UK number one as of 2012[update] with the title track of his LP release that year, "Pipes of Peace".
